imgui.flag

Class ImGuiTabItemFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • imgui.flag.ImGuiTabItemFlags

  • public final class ImGuiTabItemFlags
extends java.lang.Object
    Flags for ImGui::BeginTabItem()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int Leading
      Enforce the tab position to the left of the tab bar (after the tab list popup button)
      static int NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton
      Disable behavior of closing tabs (that are submitted with p_open != NULL) with middle mouse button.
      static int None 
      static int NoPushId
      Don't call PushID(tab.ID)/PopID() on BeginTabItem()/EndTabItem()
      static int NoReorder
      Disable reordering this tab or having another tab cross over this tab
      static int NoTooltip
      Disable tooltip for the given tab
      static int SetSelected
      Trigger flag to programmatically make the tab selected when calling BeginTabItem()
      static int Trailing
      Enforce the tab position to the right of the tab bar (before the scrolling buttons)
      static int UnsavedDocument
      Append '*' to title without affecting the ID, as a convenience to avoid using the ### operator.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • None

        public static final int None
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UnsavedDocument

        public static final int UnsavedDocument
        Append '*' to title without affecting the ID, as a convenience to avoid using the ### operator. Also: tab is selected on closure and closure is deferred by one frame to allow code to undo it without flicker.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SetSelected

        public static final int SetSelected
        Trigger flag to programmatically make the tab selected when calling BeginTabItem()
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton

        public static final int NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton
        Disable behavior of closing tabs (that are submitted with p_open != NULL) with middle mouse button. You can still repro this behavior on user's side with if (IsItemHovered() && IsMouseClicked(2)) *p_open = false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoPushId

        public static final int NoPushId
        Don't call PushID(tab.ID)/PopID() on BeginTabItem()/EndTabItem()
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoTooltip

        public static final int NoTooltip
        Disable tooltip for the given tab
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NoReorder

        public static final int NoReorder
        Disable reordering this tab or having another tab cross over this tab
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Leading

        public static final int Leading
        Enforce the tab position to the left of the tab bar (after the tab list popup button)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Trailing

        public static final int Trailing
        Enforce the tab position to the right of the tab bar (before the scrolling buttons)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
